painIntensity: I have no pain at the moment
personalCare: I can look after myself normally without causing extra pain
lifting: I can lift heavy weights without extra pain
walking: Pain does not prevent me walking any distance
sitting: I can sit in any chair as long as I like
standing: I can stand as long as I want without extra pain
sleeping: My sleep is never disturbed by pain
sexLife: My sex life is normal and causes no extra pain
socialLife: My social life is normal and gives me no extra pain
travelling: I can travel anywhere without pain

painIntensity: The pain is very mild at the moment
personalCare: I can look after myself normally but it causes extra pain
lifting: I can lift heavy weights but it gives extra pain
walking: Pain prevents me from walking more than 1 mile
sitting: I can only sit in my favourite chair as long as I like
standing: I can stand as long as I want but it gives me extra pain
sleeping: My sleep is occasionally disturbed by pain
sexLife: My sex life is normal but causes some extra pain
socialLife: My social life is normal but increases the degree of pain
travelling: I can travel anywhere but it gives extra pain

painIntensity: The pain is moderate at the moment
personalCare: It is painful to look after myself and I am slow and careful
lifting: Pain prevents me from lifting heavy weights off the floor, but I can manage if they are conveniently placed eg. on a table
walking: Pain prevents me from walking more than 1/4 mile
sitting: Pain prevents me sitting more than one hour
standing: Pain prevents me from standing for more than 1 hour
sleeping: Because of pain I have less than 6 hours sleep
sexLife: My sex life is nearly normal but is very painful
socialLife: Pain has no significant effect on my social life apart from limiting my more energetic interests eg, sport
travelling: Pain is bad but I manage journeys over two hours

painIntensity: The pain is fairly severe at the moment
personalCare: I need some help but manage most of my personal care
lifting: Pain prevents me from lifting heavy weights, but I can manage light to medium weights if they are conveniently positioned
walking: Pain prevents me from walking more than 100 yards
sitting: Pain prevents me from sitting more than 1/2 hour
standing: Pain prevents me from standing for more than 1/2 hour
sleeping: Because of pain I have less than 4 hours sleep
sexLife: My sex life is severely restricted by pain
socialLife: Pain has restricted my social life and I do not go out as often
travelling: Pain restricts me to journeys of less than one hour

painIntensity: The pain is very severe at the moment
personalCare: I need help every day in most aspects of self-care
lifting: I can lift very light weights
walking: I can only walk using a stick or crutches
sitting: Pain prevents me from sitting more than 10 minutes
standing: Pain prevents me from standing for more than 10 minutes
sleeping: Because of pain I have less than 2 hours sleep
sexLife: My sex life is nearly absent because of pain
socialLife: Pain has restricted my social life to home
travelling: Pain restricts me to short necessary journeys under 30 minutes

painIntensity: The pain is the worst imaginable at the moment
personalCare: I do not get dressed, I wash with difficulty and stay in bed
lifting: I cannot lift or carry anything at all
walking: I am in bed most of the time and have to crawl to the toilet.
sitting: Pain prevents me from sitting at all
standing: Pain prevents me from standing at all
sleeping: Pain prevents me from sleeping at all
sexLife: Pain prevents any sex life at all
socialLife: I have no social life because of pain
travelling: Pain prevents me from travelling except to receive treatment
